zimbra-zimlet-bigbluebutton.title: BigBlueButton
zimbra-zimlet-bigbluebutton.dialInText: Alternatively you can join this meeting using a telephone number and PIN. For more information visit:
zimbra-zimlet-bigbluebutton.slogan: BigBlueButton provides real-time sharing of audio, video, slides, chat, and screen.
zimbra-zimlet-bigbluebutton.addMeetingDetails: Add BigBlueButton information to the Appointment
zimbra-zimlet-bigbluebutton.default_passwords: Here you can set the default moderator and attendee passwords. Changes here affect only new meetings, not already planned ones.
zimbra-zimlet-bigbluebutton.password_required: Please set a Moderator and Attendee Password
zimbra-zimlet-bigbluebutton.Meeting_Message:
To join the Meeting Online go to:
[meetinglink]

You can use the following password:
[passwordattendeePassword]
zimbra-zimlet-bigbluebutton.set_defaults: Set as default for future meetings
zimbra-zimlet-bigbluebutton.passwordRequired: Please set a Moderator and Attendee Password
